title: Arctic Wolf Aurora Endpoint Security Network Insights
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of aurora focus network-based, dns-based and http visibility events.

definition.content:
[Arctic Wolf Aurora Endpoint Security](https://docs.arcticwolf.com/bundle/AES-Overview/page/What-is-Aurora-Endpoint-Security.html) is a unified solution that helpsÂ  to tackle modern threats. It provides comprehensive capabilities to detect and protect against threats across endpoints.

This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of aurora focus network-based, dns-based and http visibility events.

For more information, see the [Arctic Wolf Aurora Endpoint Security Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/arctic_wolf_aurora_platform/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

Tracks network-based detection events on devices, including the instigating process, source and destination IPs and ports, severity, device and user information, and detection rule details. Helps quickly identify suspicious or malicious activity, understand which processes triggered detections.

Tracks DNS-based detection events on devices, including the instigating process, target domain, resolved IP addresses, severity, device and user information, and detection rule details. Helps identify suspicious or malicious DNS activity, understand which processes triggered the events.

Tracks HTTP-based detection events on devices, including the instigating process, request and response details, target domain, headers, request method, response status, severity, device and user information, and detection rule details. Helps identify suspicious or malicious HTTP activity and provides visibility into which processes and endpoints are generating potentially risky web traffic.

definition.title: HTTP visibility detection events over time

definition.content: Gives a focused view of incoming Network, DNS and HTTP logs, showing event statuses over time and highlighting critical entries to help with quick review and investigation of important security events.
